If you could only keep one memory from your life, which one would it be?
If you could instantly change your career, what would you choose to do?
What is your biggest regret?
What is a recurring dream you have?
What are your guilty pleasures?
Have you ever met anyone famous? If so, who?
What is your biggest fear?
What's your most embarassing moment?
What is something your oddly proud of, but don't regularly share with others?
Do you have a hidden talent? If so, what is it?
What's something you wish you would have done sooner?
What is one thing you would like to change about yourself that is NOT physical, and why?
What is the scariest thing that has ever happened to you?
What is the best gift you've ever received?

If you could be remembered for one thing after you die, what would you want it to be?

If you could have a conversation with your younger self, what advice would you give?
If you could have a guaranteed successful career in any field, which would you choose and why?
If you could remember every single detail of your life, would you want to? Why or why not?
